short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension alerts England-based users about floods based on their location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay informed about flood risks in England

Flood Watch is your essential Chrome extension for monitoring flood risks in England. By tracking your location, it keeps you informed about potential flood alerts in your area, helping you stay prepared and protect what matters most.

Features:
- Timely flood alerts: receive notifications about flood warnings and active alerts near your location as they are updated.
- Location-based monitoring: enter your address in England to track flood risks specific to your area.
- Comprehensive flood reports: access detailed information, including severity levels, affected areas, and advisory messages.
- Interactive map: visualize flood warnings on an easy-to-use map for better awareness.
- Regular updates: stay informed with the latest flood information for England, sourced directly from the Environment Agency.
- Privacy-focused: your location data is stored on your device and is never shared with us or any third parties.

Flood Watch is designed to provide timely updates for individuals and businesses in England. Whether you’re at home, planning your day, or preparing for potential risks, Flood Watch helps you make informed decisions with confidence.

Download Flood Watch today and stay informed—because preparedness is key to safety.

For any questions or feedback, feel free to contact us. Your input matters!
